p: The effect of essential oil of L. montevidensis and ascorbic acid on DPPH reduction is shown in Figure 3. Ascorbic acid exhibited DPPH radical scavenging activity in a concentration-dependent manner ( Figure 3), with IC 50 value of 0.042 g/mL. However, L. montevidensis leaf essential oil did not exhibit DPPH radical scavenging activity at all the concentrations tested ( Figure 3).
